metadata.title: CVE-2025-23109 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Long hostnames in URLs could be leveraged to obscure the actual host of thewebsite or spoof the website address This vulnerability affects Firefox foriOS < 134.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
